revisions.rev:
{{wiktionary|Propaganda|propaganda}} '''[[Propaganda]]''' is a form of communication that is aimed at influencing the attitude of a community toward some cause or position.
'''Propaganda''' may also refer to: {{tocright}} ==Books and magazines== *[[Propaganda (book)|''Propaganda'' (book)]], 1928 book by Edward Bernays *''[[Academic Games#Propaganda|Propaganda, The Game]]'', part of the set of Academic Games developed by Professors Robert and Layman Allen *''Propaganda: The Formation of Men's Attitudes'', 1965 book by [[Jacques Ellul]] *[[Propaganda (magazine)|''Propaganda'' (magazine)]], a former influential magazine of the [[Goth subculture]]
== Music == ;Bands *[[Propaganda (band)]], German synthpop group, formed in 1982 *[[Propaganda (Serbian band)]], former 1980s Yugoslav New Wave band from Belgrade
;Albums *[[Propaganda (Sparks album)|''Propaganda'' (Sparks album)]], 1974 *[[Propaganda (The Sound album)|''Propaganda'' (The Sound album)]], 1999 *[[Propaganda (Aftershock album)|''Propaganda'' (Aftershock album)]], 2001 compilation album *[[Propaganda (Melotron album)|''Propaganda'' (Melotron album)]], 2007
;Songs *"Propaganda", song by Sepultura on their album ''[[Chaos A.D.]]'' *"Propaganda", song by [[Briskeby]] *"Propaganda", song from ''[[Absolute Design]]'' by Engel
== Film == *[[Propaganda (film)|''Propaganda'' (film)]], 1999 Turkish comedy film by director Sinan Ãetin *[[Propaganda film]], usually a documentary-style production or a fictional screenplay, that is produced to convince the viewer of a certain political point or influence the opinions or behavior of people, often by providing deliberately misleading, propagandistic content *[[Propaganda Films]], a music video company
==Other uses== * [[Sacra congregatio de propaganda fide]], former Latin name of the Congregation for the Evangelization of Peoples *[[Propaganda (desktop backgrounds)]], a collection of free desktop backgrounds *[[Propaganda Games]], former game development company based in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada
{{disambig}}
